name: Grilled Chicken Salad
descriptions: This is a lovely medley of grilled chicken, lettuce leaves and cheese, tossed in a flavoursome vinaigrette. The addition of almonds gives it a nice crunch. It is perfect when you don’t want to put extra effort in cooking but still wants to eat something healthy.

name: Thai Raw Papaya Salad
descriptions: This salad, also known as “som tam”, has a crispy texture and combines wonderfully with the spice of green chilies, sourness of the lemon juice and the sweetness of honey. Green papaya salad is a flavor-filled dish that will make a great starter for a party. It is easy to make, low in calories, and very nutritious.

name: Perfect Caesar Salad
descriptions: This classic salad is basic but truly irresistible. Make all the components at home and it’s a knock out stunner. The savory, creamy dressing will instantly become a household favorite. And the crunchy garlicky croutons…well, you’ll be eating them off the baking sheet.

name: Easy Arugula Salad
descriptions: This is the simplest arugula salad you’ll make! You don’t even have to make a salad dressing. In under 10 minutes, you’ve got an elegant salad that goes with literally everything. Dress baby arugula simply with olive oil and lemon juice, then add Parmesan shavings and thinly sliced shallots. Arugula is a leafy green that has a peppery flavor and is rich in vitamin K, folate, and calcium.

name: Crisp Apple Salad
descriptions: This is a stunning apple salad recipe that pairs crisp tart apple slices with pops of pomegranate seeds, creamy goat cheese, and crunchy, cinnamon-spiced pecans. Toss them all over fresh greens with a zingy maple and apple cider vinegar dressing, and it’s truly salad perfection. Apples are a good source of fiber, vitamin C, and flavonoids that have anti-inflammatory effects.

name: Perfect Italian Salad
descriptions: This salad is crisp and refreshing: a mix of crunchy vegetables, olives, artichokes, cheese and Italian herbs. It’s the perfect side dish for pizza or pasta. The homemade Italian dressing is tangy, savory, herby and balanced.

name: Veg Pizza
descriptions: This pizza recipe helps you to make the best tasting pizza at home along with homemade pizza sauce. It is a simple recipe that uses basic ingredients and can be customized with your choice of toppings. You can use a mix of vegetables like capsicum, onions, olives, tomatoes, mushrooms, corn, etc. You can also add cheese and herbs for extra flavor.

name: Pepperoni
descriptions: This is a popular pizza that is topped with pepperoni slices, a type of spicy salami, along with tomato sauce and cheese. It is one of the most ordered pizzas in the US and Canada.

name: Marinara
descriptions: This is a simple pizza that has only tomato sauce, garlic, oregano and olive oil as toppings. It is one of the oldest pizzas in Naples and it is named after the sailors who used to eat it.

name: Capricciosa
descriptions: This is a pizza that has a variety of toppings, such as mushrooms, artichokes, olives, ham and eggs, along with tomato sauce and cheese. It is named after the Italian word for capricious or whimsical, because of its diverse ingredients.

name: Diavola
descriptions: This is a spicy pizza that has salami piccante, a type of hot salami, as the main topping, along with tomato sauce and cheese. It is named after the Italian word for devilish or fiery, because of its heat level.

name: Napoletana
descriptions: This is a pizza that has anchovies, capers and oregano as toppings, along with tomato sauce and cheese. It is a traditional pizza from Naples and it is also known as pizza alla pescatora, meaning fisherman’s pizza.

name: Minestrone
descriptions: This is a classic Italian soup that consists of various vegetables, beans and pasta in a tomato-based broth. It is a hearty and nutritious soup that can be made with different seasonal ingredients. Some common vegetables used in minestrone are carrots, celery, onions, zucchini, cabbage and spinach.

name: Chicken Noodle
descriptions: This is a popular soup that is made with chicken broth, cooked chicken, noodles and vegetables such as carrots, celery and onions. It is often seasoned with herbs like parsley, thyme and bay leaf.

name: Clam Chowder
descriptions: This is a thick and creamy soup that contains clams, potatoes, onions, celery and bacon in a milk or cream-based broth. It is a traditional dish of New England and other coastal regions of the US and Canada.

name: French Onion
descriptions: This is a rich and savory soup that is made with caramelized onions, beef broth, wine, thyme and bay leaf. It is usually topped with toasted bread and melted cheese such as gruyere or swiss. It is a classic dish of French cuisine that originated in Paris.

name: Gazpacho
descriptions: This is a cold soup that is made with raw blended vegetables such as tomatoes, cucumbers, peppers, onions and garlic. It is seasoned with olive oil, vinegar, salt and pepper. It is a refreshing and light soup that originated in Andalusia, Spain.

name: Lentil
descriptions: This is a hearty and nutritious soup that is made with lentils, vegetables, spices and broth. It is a common dish in many cuisines, such as Indian, Middle Eastern and Mediterranean. Lentils are a good source of protein, fiber, iron and folate. They can be cooked with different types of broth, such as chicken, vegetable or beef, and flavored with different spices, such as cumin, turmeric, curry or paprika.

name: Apple Pie
descriptions: This is a classic dessert that consists of a flaky pastry crust filled with spiced apple slices and baked until golden and bubbly. It is often served with whipped cream or vanilla ice cream. It is a traditional dish of American cuisine that originated from the British settlers

name: Brownies
descriptions: These are chewy, fudgy squares of chocolate cake that are usually baked in a rectangular pan and cut into pieces. They can be plain or have nuts, chocolate chips, frosting or other toppings. They are a popular treat in the US and Canada and can be eaten as a snack or a dessert.

name: Cheesecake
descriptions: This is a rich and creamy dessert that is made with cream cheese, eggs, sugar and a crust of crushed cookies or graham crackers. It can be baked or unbaked and can have various flavors and toppings, such as fruit, chocolate, caramel or nuts. It is a common dessert in many cuisines, such as American, Greek and Japanese.

name: Eclairs
descriptions: These are elongated pastries made with choux dough that are filled with whipped cream or pastry cream and topped with chocolate icing. They are a classic dessert of French cuisine and can have different flavors and fillings, such as coffee, vanilla or caramel.

name: Donuts
descriptions: These are deep-fried pieces of dough that are usually shaped into rings or balls and coated with sugar, glaze or frosting. They can also have fillings such as jam, custard or cream. They are a popular breakfast or snack item in many countries, such as the US, Canada, Australia and France

name: Halva
descriptions: This is a dense and sweet confection that is made with sesame seeds, honey, sugar and sometimes nuts or dried fruits. It can have different flavors and colors, depending on the ingredients and the region of origin. It is a common dessert in many Middle Eastern, Asian and European countries, such as Turkey, India and Greece.

name: Mojito
descriptions: This is a refreshing cocktail that consists of white rum, lime juice, sugar, mint leaves and soda water, muddled and served over ice in a highball glass. It is a sweet and sour drink that originated in Cuba in the 16th century.

name: Margarita
descriptions: This is a popular cocktail that consists of tequila, orange liqueur and lime juice, shaken with ice and served in a salt-rimmed glass. It can be served on the rocks, blended or straight up. It is a tangy and salty drink that originated in Mexico in the 20th century.

name: Martini
descriptions: This is a classic cocktail that consists of gin and dry vermouth, stirred or shaken with ice and strained into a chilled glass. It is usually garnished with an olive or a lemon twist. It is a strong and dry drink that originated in the US in the late 19th century.

name: Pina Colada
descriptions: This is a tropical cocktail that consists of white rum, coconut cream and pineapple juice, blended with ice or shaken and served in a hurricane glass. It is usually garnished with a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry. It is a creamy and sweet drink that originated in Puerto Rico in the 1950s.

name: Negroni
descriptions: This is a bitter cocktail that consists of gin, Campari and sweet vermouth, stirred with ice and served in a rocks glass. It is usually garnished with an orange slice or peel. It is a strong and balanced drink that originated in Italy in the early 20th century.

name: Daiquiri
descriptions: This is a simple cocktail that consists of white rum, lime juice and sugar, shaken with ice and strained into a coupe glass. It can also be blended with ice or fruit for a frozen version. It is a sour and refreshing drink that originated in Cuba in the late 19th century.
